title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin celebrates Steph Curry breaking the NBA's record for most 3 pointers all-time and why he would be great playing in any era. He discusses Aaron Rodgers' future in Green Bay and why there's one team in the AFC that would be a perfect fit if he's traded. He also explains why Russell Westbrook's time with the Lakers could be coming to an end. Plus, Fox Sports Reporter Tom Rinaldi joins the show to talk about the John Madden documentary, what made him so special and unique as one of the most impactful people in the history of football. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
